gestures.name: Tiger
gestures.description: Index and middle fingers extended, crossed in front

gestures.name: Ram
gestures.description: Index and middle fingers extended upward, others closed

gestures.name: Dog
gestures.description: All fingers closed except pinky and thumb

gestures.name: Monkey
gestures.description: Index and pinky extended, others closed

gestures.name: Rabbit
gestures.description: Index and middle extended upward, thumb up

gestures.name: Ox
gestures.description: Index finger pointing upward, others closed

gestures.name: Bird
gestures.description: Thumb and index forming circle, others extended

gestures.name: Horse
gestures.description: Index and pinky raised, middle and ring bent
